body.p: Born on April 9,1803 on soldiers' retreat, his family's estate outside of Louisville. Graduated from Harvard in 1822. He was a Planter and Lawyer in the Cincinnati area in the decades leading up to the Civil War. Brother of Brigadier General Robert Anderson. Died in February 27, 1878.
